that, Buke had been growing and increasing power gradualy. Buke did have st=
ronger power than Emperor since Heisi ( Kiyomori Taira ) and followed by Ge=
nji ( Yoritomo ) , then Asikaga, warriors days to Nobunaga, Hideyosi, and Y=
eyasu Tokugawa ( Shogun ) for over 260 years, ruining Japan . Even under Bu=
ke, Emperor has been still aliving.However, at the end of Tokugawa , Edo er=
a, Buke had been vanished completely and disappeared . Then, under new gove=

uke vanish in Japanese history after 1,000 years since birth ?
